citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:18 am on 15-
NOV-22.
Contacted licensee by cell phone. It was relayed that no responsible adult was available for a walk-through inspection for
the rest of the day.
Additional Inspectors:
Madeline Anna, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
